metadata.title: CVE-2017-20151 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in iText RUPS. Thisvulnerability affects unknown code of the filesrc/main/java/com/itextpdf/rups/model/XfaFile.java. The manipulation leadsto xml external entity reference. The patch is identified asac5590925874ef810018a6b60fec216eee54fb32. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. VDB-217054 is the identifier assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: libitext-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
